mapper.insert: insert into T_RESUME(RESUME_NAME, RESUME__SEX, RESUME__PHONE, RESUME__EMAIL, RESUME_AGE, RESUME_ADDRESS, RESUME_SALARYEXPECTATION, RESUME_EDUCATION, RESUME_EDUCATIONTIME, RESUME_COMPANY, RESUME_TIME, RESUME_POSITION, RESUME_EXPERIENCE, T_ID) values (#{resumeName},#{resumeSex},#{resumePhone},#{resumeEmail},#{resumeAge},#{resumeAddress},#{resumeSalaryExpectation},#{resumeEducation},#{resumeEducationTime},#{resumeCompany},#{resumeTime},#{resumePosition},#{resumeExperience},#{rId})
